snippet: The plan for Rye Playland, the aging Art Deco park by Long Island Sound, calls for a great lawn overlooking the water, new restaurants and an event space.
abstract: Westchester County officials announce plans for a complete makeover of Rye Playland, 1920s-era amusement park.
lead_paragraph: The plan for Rye Playland, the aging Art Deco park by Long Island Sound, calls for a great lawn overlooking the water, new restaurants and an event space.

headline.seo: Rye Playland Redevelopment Plan Chosen by Westchester
headline.main: Open Space and Fewer Rides in Westchester Park’s Reinvention Plan
headline.print_headline: Open Space and Fewer Rides in Westchester Park’s Reinvention Plan
